item.title: The "Two Laptops" Problem Solved
item.description: I think I’ve solved the two laptops problem. I realized that its not really a problem worth solving.

item.title: The "Two Laptops" Problem Cont'd
item.description: It’s October. Still have two personal laptops. Both running nixos; well, both were running nixos.

item.title: Nixos: Overriding System Packages
item.description: This one’s short. Is there a system package in Nixos whose source you wish to replace with your own?

item.title: The "Two Laptops" Problem
item.description: About three years ago, I bought a decked out XPS 13 to replace a five year old Thinkpad E535 I had.
